channel.title: Need help changing the item slot
channel.description:
Ok, I want to make it change the slot of and item of where it is worn, eg.
The fishbowl helmet, when you wear it, it goes into the weapon slot, I want it to be on the head slot...
Can someone explain this to me please. ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2007, 07:22:57 PM[/size][hr]Anyone ? :\
